author: jeremias
msg: First batch of changes for preparation for adoption of Avalon patterns. Only changes on logging for now. Mostly usage of LogEnabled contract interface. Separate mail follows.

msg: Improve build process for more flexibility when external jars change.
Changed to use -projecthelp option from Ant 1.5 instead of "usage" target.
